name: MeditationSounds
0:
”Alexa, open meditation sound”
”Alexa, ask meditation sound to play forest sound”
”Alexa, ask meditation sound to play relaxing music”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: meditation sound
des:
Meditation Sounds skill will help you with your daily Meditations. It contains various meditation sounds including forest, ocean, rain, aum chanting, relaxing music, morning relaxation music. 

To launch, just say -- Alexa, open Meditation Sounds

Main commands:
1. Play, forest sound 
2. Play, ocean sound 
3. Play, thunderstorm rain sound 
4. Play, aum chanting 
5. Play, morning relaxation 
6. Play, relaxing music

You can stop, pause, resume and also start from beginning as well. Commands are:
1. Alexa, stop
2. Alexa, pause
3. Alexa, resume
4. Alexa, start from beginning or Alexa, start over

SUPPORT:
Email us at alexa@hauper.com if you have any difficulties.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
